title: Specialist Physiotherapy
description: Targeted rehabilitation that protects your regenerative investment and keeps pain away for good.
longDescription: Regenerative injections create the healing opportunity—physiotherapy locks in the gains. Our musculoskeletal specialists design bespoke programmes that match your injection protocol, combining mobility, strength, neuromuscular control, and lifestyle coaching. Expect measurable progress, not generic exercises.

overview.title: Integrated Rehab, Designed Around You
overview.content: Every programme starts with movement screening, strength testing, and lifestyle review. We synchronise exercises with your injection timeline—protecting tissue while it remodels, then progressively loading for resilience. Expect digital tracking, video libraries, and ongoing consultant input.
highlights: Supports PRP, adipose, BMAC, Arthrosamid®, and surgery-free plans
Includes strength, mobility, balance, and neuromuscular control

Sleep, stress, and nutrition guidance to speed recovery

faq.question: How often do I attend?
faq.answer: Typically weekly for the first 4-6 sessions, then bi-weekly as strength improves.

faq.question: Do I need injections first?
faq.answer: No, we support standalone physiotherapy or combine with regenerative treatments.
